hero.subtitle: We care for your mental health and well-being with qualified professionals and a complete platform.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Melhor Saúde is Mozambique's leading corporate wellness platform, created to transform how companies care for their people. We were born from the need for complete, accessible, and effective solutions that promote stronger, more humane, and productive organizational environments. We combine technology, professional trust, and a people-centered approach to connect companies, employees, and health and wellness specialists. We operate with ethical rigor, valuing confidentiality and professional secrecy in all consultations, and offer humanized, strategic, and digital care that redefines the wellness experience in the corporate environment.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We promote comprehensive employee well-being through secure, personalized digital solutions sustained by the four pillars of health: psychological, legal, financial, and physical. Our goal is to help companies create healthy, positive, and sustainable work environments where everyone can thrive with balance and autonomy.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We want to be the leading national reference in corporate wellness solutions. We work to build a new organizational culture in Mozambique — more conscious, humane, and committed to the complete and continuous care of employees in all essential areas of their lives.

values.title: Our Values
values.content: We act with ethics, transparency, and human focus. We value confidentiality, responsible use of technology, and active listening. We believe in the real impact of psychological, legal, financial, and physical care — with measurable, accessible solutions centered on each person's needs.

psychological.title: Psychological Health
psychological.description: Taking care of mental health is essential to maintaining emotional balance, productivity, and quality of life in the workplace.
features: Counseling on work stress and burnout

financial.title: Financial Health
financial.description: Reduce financial stress through comprehensive financial literacy and practical support in personal and family economic management.

physical.title: Physical Health
physical.description: Promote vitality and well-being through preventive medicine, balanced nutrition, and exercise programs adapted to the business environment.
features: Access to qualified doctors and nutritionists

legal.title: Legal & Social Health
legal.description: Legal security is an essential part of well-being, enabling informed decisions and complete legal protection for employees and their families.

whatIs.question: What is Melhor Saúde and what are its pillars?
whatIs.answer: Melhor Saúde is a corporate wellness platform focused on four essential pillars: Psychological Health, Financial Health, Physical Health, and Legal & Social Health. Each pillar provides access to specialized professionals and resources to support employees in an integrated way.

howToBook.question: How does session booking work?
howToBook.answer: Booking is done through the digital platform, where you can choose the specialist, session type (individual, couples, or group), modality (in-person or online), and the time that best suits your schedule.

quota.question: What is the session quota and how does it work?
quota.answer: The session quota is the number of consultations available within the plan contracted by your company. You can track your balance through the platform and, if necessary, request additional sessions.

individualPlan.question: Can I join the individual plan without a company?
individualPlan.answer: Yes. We offer individual plans for those who wish to access our services independently, with special conditions and continuous support from our specialists.

businessPlan.question: How does the business plan work?
businessPlan.answer: The business plan allows organizations to offer comprehensive wellness to their employees. It includes unlimited access to professionals from all areas, corporate dashboard, wellness reports, and dedicated administrative support.

selfHelp.question: Can I access self-help content without booking sessions?
selfHelp.answer: Yes! The platform offers a library of educational resources, psychological tests, articles, videos, and materials on finance, mental health, nutrition, and law, accessible at any time.

providerTypes.question: What type of professionals are available?
providerTypes.answer: We have clinical psychologists, specialized lawyers, certified financial consultants, nutritionists, general practice doctors, and physical education professionals — all accredited and with proven experience.

confidentiality.question: Are my consultations confidential?
confidentiality.answer: Yes. All sessions follow strict confidentiality and professional secrecy standards. Companies do not have access to session content — only aggregated and anonymous data for wellness monitoring purposes.

sessionTypes.question: Are sessions online or in-person?
sessionTypes.answer: We offer both modalities. You can choose between video consultations (more practical and flexible) or in-person, according to your preference and professional availability.

cancelReschedule.question: How can I cancel or reschedule a session?
cancelReschedule.answer: You can cancel or reschedule directly through the platform, with a minimum of 24 hours notice to avoid quota deduction.

extraServices.question: Are there additional services available?
extraServices.answer: Yes. In addition to consultations, we offer personalized corporate wellness programs, workshops, lectures, health screenings, and workplace healthy habit promotion initiatives.

getStarted.question: How can I start using the platform?
getStarted.answer: If your company is already a partner, you will receive an email invitation. Otherwise, you can create an individual account or contact us to implement Melhor Saúde in your organization.
